entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Lunenburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:18 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lunenburg 02:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: 0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 79 %
Dewpoint: -2.6°C
Wind: WNW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain mixed with snow beginning overnight. Fog patches overnight. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 4 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
